layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x368
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x368
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x352
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 200x352 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutBlockFlow {CAPTION} at (0,0) size 200x206 [border: (3px solid #FFA500)]
          LayoutText {#text} at (89,3) size 22x19
            text run at (89,3) width 22: "cap"
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,207) size 198x144
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,30) size 198x84
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (30,30) size 138x84 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (16,16) size 52x52 [border: (1px solid #008000)]
                LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (1,1) size 402x302 [border: (1px solid #FF0000)]
                  LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 8x19
                    text run at (1,1) width 8: "d"
